name: Linda Johnson
text: We ordered a large works pizza.  The person who helped me on the phone was great,  the delivery driver was very nice and our pizza came in a reasonable amount of time.  The pizza was burnt on top.  They should not have delivered it,  not really happy right now

name: Travis Purser
text: Ordered the chicken bacon ranch, meat pizza, and bacon stuffed bread sticks. OMG the food flavor was so good. The staff on the phone was friendly and very helpful. 2 draw backs are that the bread sticks didn't come with bacon, and on their ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave Den Adel
text: Their crust is to die for. Seriously, I risked getting into a near miss car accident and suffering heat stroke to get there. Many flavors of crust that all taste the same. Great pizza with zero seating. Well, there is a dilapidated picnic table you can sit at. Make sure your tetanus shot is up to date....üçïüçïüçï

name: Linda Kane
text: The pizza came cold and the overall taste so.so. We were there led they were awesome, but no where near that . Very disappointed!

text: It's good but sometimes I wish they had a little bit higher quality cheese instead of an overabundance of not as good cheese but it's definitely better than Pizza hut

text: It was fun, but the pizza was nothing special. The customer service was ok, but not super friendly.

name: susan robinson
text: Food was good service needs improving.Took average time for delivery called when we got order arrived realizing the forgot something called the store and the promised to deliver it 40 minutes passed no delivery called again they had no delivery  driver so they said it would be 40 minutes more.

name: Alex Warren
text: Good pizza for chain restaurant style. I would definitely skip Domino's or Little Cesar's to come here again. The service was prompt and friendly and the pizza didn't take long at all to be prepared. I got the BBQ chicken pizza and it was ‚Ä¶More

name: Ricky Stevens
text: There pizza is so amazingly delicious!! If they where closer to where I live I would go there daily..

name: The Todd
text: Bacon stuffed cheese bread...yes please

name: Toni Sauls
text: Great pizza for a great price

name: Andy Leclair
text: Ordered a Steak sub. What I got was a cheese and mushroom blob of S***. Ended up giving it to my dogs so I don't have a nasty picture. They would not replace it with something else or refund my money on that item. Call corporate is all I got. Will never order from them again!!

name: John Bunderson
text: Unique flavored crust pizza. The pricing is reasonable, taste is okay. The company likes to sponsor elementary schools. I appreciate that. The over flavor is okay, just not great. You won't regret pie from here, but I think you can't eat it every night for a week.

name: Sherry Guerrero
text: Pizza is way to over priced, the app never works, and poorly customer service threw phone and in person. Very disappointed honestly, at least Little Ceasers is nicer and values their customers and doesn't act like they hate their Job so much. ‚úå

text: Good service and there is someone for everyone. Love their flavored crusts!!

name: Ashlee Vaughan
text: Best crust in southern Utah. Hands down! Use your Dixie Direct card to save.

name: Hera Ellwood
text: I ordered online and got exactly what I wanted in under 20 minutes.  The product itself is always fantastic.  The vegetables are fresh and crunchy and the flavored crust is well worth it. They always have a deal going on too.

name: oaks
text: I was placed on hold before I can even get greeted, then hung up on after eight minutes of waiting. ‚Ä¶More

text: Their pizza is good. Sometimes they are a bit slow, but they usually do well . They have enough choices that we can all get something we like.

text: Ahhhh so yummy good pizza

name: Logan Miller
text: I would give it a 4.5 in my book. The pizza is good! The garlic crust is always tasty. I eat gluten free so my only option is a small size which is frustrating. Sometimes the employees are knuckle-headed but the product is very good.

name: Allen Allen
text: It's better than Dominoes or Pizza Hut if you need delivery.

name: Paula Moore
text: The pizza here is fantastic. There are so many varieties and it was difficult to chose just one. But, the service was good and the food was excellent.

text: Ordered two pizzas, one came with no sauce. It seems like every other time I get a pizza here, something's wrong.

name: Justin Seegmiller
text: Fast friendly service along with great pizza. With a variety of crust and lots of combo specials it is a great place to get great pizza.

name: Ariana Gleaton
text: I LOVE their garlic and herb flavored crust. Unfortunately, the crust is twice as good as the actual pizza itself.

name: Beth Grover
text: I called 5 minutes before closing for delivery with the intent of giving the driver a $40 tip for it being so late. I was on hold for 3 minutes, at 10:58 p.m. someone in the store hung up on me. I understand last minute deliveries are a ‚Ä¶More

text: Sincerely disappointed. After an hour and twenty minutes I finally received my delivery order.. but when I tried to speak with the manager, Tom, about the wait his only response was "I guess I should have called you when I realized it was going to take longer than promised." I will not be returning.
